scripts.dev: cross-env  HUZAN_ENV=development DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true PORT=8686 umi dev
scripts.start: cross-env HUZAN_ENV=development DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true PORT=9797 umi dev
scripts.start:noMock: cross-env MOCK=none HUZAN_ENV=development DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true PORT=3535 umi dev
scripts.start:speed: cross-env SPEED_MEASURE=CONSOLE HUZAN_ENV=development DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true PORT=5656 umi dev
scripts.start:max: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 HUZAN_ENV=development DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true PORT=9898 umi dev
scripts.start:demandCompile: cross-env HUZAN_ENV=development DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true DEMAND_COMPILE=true PORT=7777 umi dev
scripts.start:noharesource: cross-env DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true HUZAN_ENV=development HARD_SOURCE=none umi dev
scripts.start:debug: cross-env WATCH_FILES=1 ESLINT=none HUZAN_ENV=development DEBUG=umi*,af-webpack* EMAND=none umi dev
scripts.build:develop_cdn: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 IS_USE_CDN=true HUZAN_ENV=production_develop umi build
scripts.build:develop: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 HUZAN_ENV=production_develop DISABLE_BROWSER_DETECTION=true umi build
scripts.build:master: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 HUZAN_ENV=production_master umi build
scripts.build:staging: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 HUZAN_ENV=production_staging umi build
scripts.build:test: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 HUZAN_ENV=production_test umi build
scripts.build:test_cdn: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 IS_USE_CDN=true HUZAN_ENV=production_test umi build
scripts.build:open: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 HUZAN_ENV=production_test PREVIEW_ENV=true umi build && cross-env MOCK=none npm run open
scripts.build:speed: cross-env PROGRESS=none NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 SPEED_MEASURE=CONSOLE HUZAN_ENV=production_develop PREVIEW_ENV=true umi build
scripts.build:splitting: cross-env HUZAN_ENV=production_develop CODE_SPLITTING_LEVEL=3 umi build && npm run open
scripts.build:analyze: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 HUZAN_ENV=production_develop ANALYZE=1 umi build
